CustomField.formula: CASE( Industry__c, 'Accounting',Metro_Area__r.Accounting_Programs_Available__c, 'Advertising',Metro_Area__r.Advertising_Programs_Available__c, 'AT&T - Alliance' , Metro_Area__r.AT_T_Programs_Available__c, 'AT&T - APEX' , Metro_Area__r.AT_T_Programs_Available__c, 'Commercial Cleaning' , Metro_Area__r.Commercial_Cleaning_Programs_Available__c , 'Commercial Roofing' , Metro_Area__r.Commercial_Roofing_Programs_Available__c, 'Commercial Insurance',Metro_Area__r.Commercial_Insurance_Programs_Available__c, 'Construction' , Metro_Area__r.Construction_Programs_Available__c , 'HVAC' , Metro_Area__r.HVAC_Programs_Available__c , 'IT' , Metro_Area__r.IT_Programs_Available__c, 'LED Lighting' , Metro_Area__r.LED_Programs_Available__c, 'Mortgage - LO Recruitment' , Metro_Area__r.LO_Recruitment_Available__c, 'Mortgage - Realtor Referral' , Metro_Area__r.Mortgage_Programs_Available__c , 'Real Estate Agent Recruitment' , Metro_Area__r.Real_Estate_Agent_Recruitment_Available__c, 'Solar' , Metro_Area__r.Solar_Programs_Available__c, 'Software',Metro_Area__r.Software_Programs_Available__c, 'Telecom' , Metro_Area__r.Telecom_Programs_Available__c, 0)
CustomField.label: Number of Available Programs
